1.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4
1.description: 19.19cm (7'6) Infinity Flex Display with an Under Display Camera, Dynamic AMOLED 2X  with Adaptive Refresh Rate. Cover Display - 15.82cm (6.2) Infinity-O Display, Switchable 60/120Hz

2.title: Apple iPhone 14
2.description: 15.40 cm (6.1-inch) Super Retina XDR display. Advanced camera system for better photos in any light. Cinematic mode now in 4K Dolby Vision up to 30 fps.
